subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: When the final seconds ticked off an instant classic Saturday, Alabama celebrated, rather wildly, its SEC championship win over Georgia that earned it a spot in the B.C.S. title game, opposite Notre Dame.
snippet: When the final seconds ticked off an instant classic Saturday, Alabama celebrated, rather wildly, its SEC championship win over Georgia that earned it a spot in the B.C.S. title game, opposite Notre Dame.
